block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

custom-block.comment: right click and select "edit" to see the definition

scripts.comment: draw Custom Bitmap on OLED SSD1306
moving the bitmap accross the screen
3 - 8x8 - 16x16 - 16x16 3 predefined bitmap examples - 8x8 alien - 16x16 star - 16x16 snow flake
16x16 - animiate the 16x16 bitmap - dropping snow flake
moving the bitmap accross the screen

custom-block.comment: Note : use "Invert" so that the bitmap will appear regardless of background
Invert Note : use "Invert" 2 times to erase the bitmap
